name: Slowpoke
flavorText:
Incredibly slow
and dopey. It
takes 5 seconds for it to feel
pain when under
attack.

previous.name: Rapidash
previous.flavorText:
Very competitive,
this POKéMON will
chase anything that moves fast
in the hopes of
racing it.

next.name: Slowbro
next.flavorText:
The SHELLDER that
is latched onto
SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed
on the host's left
over scraps.

pokemon.flavorText:

intellect and in­
tuition. Whatever the situation, it
